name: Pe-2: Dive Bomber
description: Pe-2: Diving bomber combines arcade scroller genre and fly-simulator in a universe of World War II. Each mission in game has real historical background for every month of the war.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, 7, 8 Processor: Pentium III or Higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse (Joystic optional) Resolution 1024x768 or more
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3, 7, 8 Processor: Pentium III or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse (Joystic optional)  Resolution 1024x768 or more
